channel.title: SnipSnap
channel.description: The easy Weblog and Wiki Software.
channel.dc:creator: leo
channel.dc:title: start

item.title: 2002-10-16 Fixed a bug in DV. SnipSnap now uses &#x ...
item.description: Fixed a bug in DV. SnipSnap now uses <dc:title> in RSS and DC.Title in HTML. Started to rewrite the Macro Interface to use Writer instead of StringBuffer use a Map instead of an Array to make <image:b.gif|align=left|caption=boing>
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-10-14 Near time roadmap: Complete features c ...
item.description:
Near time roadmap: Complete features currently in the work Even more extensive bug fixes
Then: Plugin architecture More :-) documentation Feature freeze for beta
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-10-10 New release version-0.2.7a. Changes: ...
item.description:
New release version-0.2.7a. Changes: Added feature: a installed blog pings to SnipSnap.org and is featured on SnipSnap.org Added feature: ping blog.gs with extendedPing Added feature: weblogs.ping is now asynchron, so posting is faster with the ping on Fixed bug: weblogs.ping now works and is default on (can be turned of in the configuration) Added feature: Detect search engine bots (Googlebot, Fast Webcrawler) Switched to RSS 2.0 by default Added feature: 0.2.7a macro displays SnipSnap version. Added feature: Added description to RSS, remove HTML from snip content Fixed bug: AdminServer did not receive shutdown command Fixed bug: application dirs must not contain space (replaced by _ now) Fixed smaller bugs
You can find it at snipsnap-download
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-10-09 Take a look at the lower right side of t ...
item.description: Take a look at the lower right side of the page. Changed snips that ping weblogs.com or another site will also appear on this site.
item.dc:creator: leo

item.description: Added weblogs ping configuration to config file in DV.
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-10-07 Fixed some xhtml bugs in RDF and Dublin ...
item.description: Fixed some xhtml bugs in RDF and Dublin Core. Validated our RSS 2.0 feed at http://aggregator.userland.com/validator
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-10-04 We are sorry for the last 12hour downtim ...
item.description: We are sorry for the last 12hour downtime. There was an internal router crash.
item.dc:creator: leo

item.title: 2002-10-02 Because the real version name is 0.2.6-a ...
item.description: Because the real version name is 0.2.6-alpha (in the config) and it's easier to link to this from other wikis and from RSS (RDF), I added a version-0.2.6-alpha snip. This will be the snip name format for versions in the future. Most reported bugs from version-0.2.6 are fixed and new files are uploaded. Just updated out local copy of the source/binary files to include command line load, stop and reload of applications. Sorry for the repeated restarts ...
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-10-01 If you have comments about SnipSnap that ...
item.description:
If you have comments about SnipSnap that we can use, contact us.
There is a new SnipSnap version-0.2.6. There are no database changes sind 0.2.5 so no DB update necessary. For download see snipsnap-download. Added feature: Dublin Core support Added feature: Broader search: searching for tree will no also find treehouse Added feature: Snip names are case insensitive Added feature: Jabber notification for new snips and User logins Added feature: {since-last-visit:funzel} to show all changed snips since last visit for funzel Added feature: --strike-- for strike through text Added feature: {quote}this is a quote{quote} Fixed bug: # in external links didn't work, <ul><ul> was rendered in weblogs, double images in external links in weblog Added feature: Changed snips since last visit Added feature: RSS Autodiscovery, RSS Added feature: {image:http://boing.org/boing.gif} for external images Added feature: create snip at search, when snip does not exist Added feature: XML-RPC Blogger API newPost() Added feature: automatic re-login via cookie Added feature: configurable list formatter, made {index:AtoZ} for A to Z listing
JabberNotifications work now. SnipNamesShouldNotBeCaseSensitive works now.
Because SnipSnap uses Lucence as it's search engine, you can use OR, AND, NOT, grouping with (), ? for single character wildcards, * for multi character wildcards (not at the beginning) and ~ which will find similar words, e.g roam~ will find foam too. "SnipSnap great"~10 will find all Snips where SnipSnap is within 10 words of great. "Funzel^4 stupid" will boost the term funzel over the term stupid. http://jakarta.apache.org/lucene/docs/queryparsersyntax.html
item.dc:creator: funzel

item.title: 2002-09-30 Started work on JabberNotifications this ...
item.description: Started work on JabberNotifications this morning. This will be a first plugin and not part of the SnipSnap base distribution because of the size of the third party libraries. olli wrote a HOWTO for writing macros in SnipSnap, Macro-HOWTO and a second example, thanks.
item.dc:creator: funzel
